title: Cashew nut roast
ingredients: ['50g butter or margarine', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon wholemeal flour', '300g cashew nuts, finely chopped', '50g wholemeal breadcrumbs (regular work just as well)', '500g puff pastry', '100g carrots, grated', '100g courgettes, grated']
